website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality, lightweight pulling oil with a blend of oils.
pros: Consumers say this is an excellent product because of its quality as well as the good results it provides in regard to oral health
It also stands out for being pleasant to use and having a good consistency
cons: Not all users liked the taste

customer_reviews.title: Great product but . .
customer_reviews.text: I love the product . . I used it previously. I previously paid $14.99 for a 16 oz bottle Much to my surprise this time an 8 oz bottle arrived for $14.99 Based on the doubling of the price I probably will not reorder, which is too bad as I like and appreciate the product . . works well, nice taste, etc 5 Stars for the product, 2 stars for the current price
customer_reviews.author: GiannaMichelle

customer_reviews.title: Third purchase for me!  Healthy gums!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this before. I have had a pocket on and off for the last 15 years around one tooth. I have had procedures and several expensive deep cleanings and it just reoccurs. I cannot believe the results if you adhere to a program. Update:: Helped with canker sores and again with inflamed pocket and gum.
customer_reviews.author: MagsA

customer_reviews.title: ... to the dentist and flossing but i am a great brusher; ) After going to the dentist after ...
customer_reviews.text: I am lazy about going to the dentist and flossing but i am a great brusher;) After going to the dentist after 2 years and using this product for about the last 6 months, the dentist said I had the best gums & teeth she has ever seen:) Use it regularly and for as long as you can keep it in your mouth. I usually swish for about 7 to 10 minutes. Namaste.
customer_reviews.author: Shi

customer_reviews.title: My hygienist recommend and I'm glad
customer_reviews.text: I've been having tender gums, and my DDS said my teeth were in great shape and my gums were clean, but they were inflamed a bit and the hygienist recommended this and so I keep the bottle in the shower and do it while I"m in there. After 3 days, my gum that was bothering me (from a crown) was totally better. It is thick but not too bad. slight mint taste after, not too bad. but DEF rinse your mouth out
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Best BioHack EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Want to impress your dentist for your next checkup and cleaning? I could not fathom how well this works for removing plaque and providing that "Just Had My Teeth Cleaned" feeling. You know it well, when you slide your tongue over those slick smooth pearly whites and sigh a sense of satisfaction? Well, you can do this all on your own with this product. It does take some effort to swish for 10 minutes every day but you will find a way to incorporate into the routine when you feel the difference. I kept reading about how wonderful Oil Pulling is for your health but no reference to the simple benefit of plaque dissolution. Simple, straightforward, effective. High recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DoMeNiQuE  CoE

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!! - ACNE SUFFERERS: READ THIS IF YOU SUFFER FROM ACNE
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from chronic acne for many years and tried anything and everything to get rid of it. I have tried products like Proactiv to no avail. A friend from yoga class talked to me about oil pulling and suggested Dosha balancing Gurunanda oil. After one week of use I can see a huge difference in my skin. No redness or bumps, just clear skin. I am so thrilled that I found this product. Has anyone else experienced the same amazing results?
customer_reviews.author: Orange22

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Just received it yesterday. Used last night and first thing this morning. Not too bad flavor or hard to use. I received a coupon thanking me for my purchase but when I went on line to claim it they repeatedly said they couldn't find that order #....yet here's my order. I checked the order # to ensure I had given the correct number and I had. I wasn't expecting a FREE oil but if you include a coupon in shipment for a FREE oil, you should at least have it set up to recognize order numbers. I will update my review later when I see how it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Buffin

customer_reviews.title: Great Results From the Dentist
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if this product would do anything to help my gum recession, but after 6 months of use, I went back for a cleaning and my dentist said my mouth and oral hygiene looked great, she also complimented the color of my teeth and gums and said any issues with recession were back in the normal range. I will definitely keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeandBooks

customer_reviews.title: Dr Fresh is the man :-)
customer_reviews.text: Met the founder when offering social media help for his company a few years back and he gave my company a few test products, this was one of them. I never knew about oil pulling, but once I started I was hooked. Really makes my teeth much whiter, kills bad bacteria and makes your mouth feel and smell very fresh!! A+
customer_reviews.author: AromaGuy33

customer_reviews.title: Best Oil Pulling Product on the Market
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite oil pulling brand. The value and quality is wonderful, and it also includes sesame seed oil along with coconut oil. I oil pull 10 minutes at a time twice a day, and not only have I noticed a difference in my health ( I haven’t gotten sick in over a year), my dentist has noticed a difference in my gums. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: mariam moghaddam

customer_reviews.title: Do as it says and you can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Good product but I still need more so I bought a three pack since after the first one is helping I would stay with it I’m so glad I tried this brand it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Kic

customer_reviews.title: It’s beneficial
customer_reviews.text: Amazing oil.... you can use it for just about anything. I use it for my face, hair, and teeth. I have very sensitive skin and when I put this on my face I didn’t break out. I also use this for my hair because the oil strengthens hair follicles and promotes hair growth. It works very well with teeth aswell. Thanks I’m glad I bought this
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to be able to oil pull
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great, I couldn't stand oil pulling with regular coconut oil but this stuff makes it easy for me to do 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Adam DeCock

customer_reviews.title: Best pulling oil I've used
customer_reviews.text: I recently began using pulling oil and find Gurunanda brand to be mild and pleasant to use. I tried 2 other pulling oils before this one, both were too strong tasting, in an unpleasant way, and irritated my mouth. I'm on my second bottle now and have noticeably whiter teeth, better breath and my mouth feels much cleaner. I highly recommend this product, especially if you have a sensitive mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Didn't notice a benefit... bad taste, hard to remove oil from sink.
customer_reviews.text: I'm reviewing after using the entire bottle. I used it daily until empty - - didn't notice a difference. Definitely no whitening - - perhaps my mouth was cleaner, but hard to tell because of awful taste. Very oily (I suppose it's supposed to be), but seemed to clog up the sink and hard to rinse from sink.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: Better Teeth Hygene
customer_reviews.text: After I brush my teeth in swish around my mouth about three times a day I feel a difference with my mouth and really appreciate this product I will continue to purchase this it has really helped out my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! I love that it’s a mixture of sesame oil, coconut and sun flower seed. It makes it perfect for oil pulling and the minty taste is wonderful. I think it’s worth the price. Such a steal
customer_reviews.author: skinnybrokefabulous

customer_reviews.title: Gum and mouth health
customer_reviews.text: The best oil pulling there is. Are used it 3 times a week and you can definitely see the whitening of Your teeth. In addition, You will see a definite improvement in gum health.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to coconut oil for pulling
customer_reviews.text: Makes it a lot easier to maintain an oil pulling routine. Product is thin to make it easier to gets to swishing. I noticed whiter teeth just 3 days after use.
customer_reviews.author: V. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I like that the oil is liquid at room temperature and it is an "all in one" product so it is "ready to go." The taste is pleasant which helps in the process of getting used to doing this. I haven't noticed any beneficial effects after only a week's use, but it is easy and recommended by my alternative practitioner so I plan to keep going with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jean T

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product after reading the reviews but was a bit skeptical however I was proven wrong. It did just as was discribed. I saw improvements in less than 2. Weeks. Mouth felt brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for your Mouth!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for oral hygiene. I experience fresh breath without any abrasive substances. Thank you for creating this product!
customer_reviews.author: P Watch

customer_reviews.title: Periodontal disease
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad at all for being oil. I purchased too help with my gums and hopefully my periodontal disease, which is what the advertising stated. I have been using for about 3 weeks . Hopefully on my next periodontist appointment in February they will be able to see some progress.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Like the smell, taste, and effectiveness!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews. I do it for this product because this is really an amazing product for teeth and gum health. I was suffering gum pain and inflammation since last week. Couldn’t even chew vegetables and can you imagine how painful it is? I immediately bought this oil pulling and other mouthwash for gum disease. Thing takes time but it does on its progress. I hope my gum disease can get better and better with using this oil pulling and the “tooth and gum tonic”from dental herb company”. I also take oral probiotics and just purchased the waterpik with “under the gum”irrigant. Hopefully my gum disease can disappear!
customer_reviews.author: Camy

customer_reviews.title: I really did want to like this!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, but I tried it twice, and all I could taste was oil, and it wasn't refreshing at all, for me. I couldn't try it again. I contacted Amazon, and I was able to return it and recieve a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Starlett*

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Skin cleared up, teeth where whiter, I love this product so much!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Same product as before ???
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product before, when I received the most recent order, the package looks different, tastes a little different too. The whitening effect is not as good - basically was not whitening at all for me. I had such a good experience before - I wonder if they changed supplier or changed the formula? Taste was ok. No whitening effect anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Exciting product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product mainly for my receding gums, which have been a constant concern for years. I couldn't believe it, but it works! Little by little, I have been using it for about 2 months and I can see a difference. Moreover, the whitening capabilities are great, too! That's especially important because whiteners do a number on the gums.
customer_reviews.author: Cafecito

customer_reviews.title: My dental hygienist says she can't believe how healthy my ...
customer_reviews.text: My dental hygienist says she can't believe how healthy my gums are. She remembers I started this when I got my braces off. Added years later: still using, still comments from dental hygienist how healthy my gums are!
customer_reviews.author: Becky R

customer_reviews.title: I Am CONVINCED With My Experience Tonight It WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE December 17, 2019: Yes I have this pulling oil since 2017 and just ran out. However I honestly have not been using it daily as I plan to do in 2020 coming up! I am SOLD in its ability to loosen a piece of nut that not my fingers or toothbrush would accomplish! I am 73 years young and I have no desire to have teeth and gum problems which I am convinced this product can help stop! So far I have only used it twice but both experiences were very pleasant. It is easy to swish this around for the suggested 10-15 minutes. I am looking forward to getting in a more regular nightly routine!
customer_reviews.author: HughSimpson

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This pulling oil really helped relieve the ache I had before my wisdom teeth were removed, it actually helped me prevent an ear infection. I would buy again, but the pulling oil is a little expensive for my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Ivoire

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I dont use this everyday.. Maybe twice a week after i do my whitening treatments because my teeth are sensitive and i like to put nutrients back in. Its always great. Also, once a week I do a very deep cleaning with waterpick and all and these feels soooo good after. I cannot attest to the whitening capabilities since Im using another product Flavor...... umm well its not bad but its umm well its just like swishing oil in your mouth...there are no flavor additives
customer_reviews.author: april cheeley

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used this for years!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everyday. I haven’t had a cold or virgin years! Love the autoship
customer_reviews.author: Lupe B

customer_reviews.title: Weird texture but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit to get used to the texture but I love the flavor way more than coconut oil! I can keep it in my mouth max 5 minutes but that’s way better than when I first started. I feel with continued use this will help keep my mouth as clean as possible from dangerous bacteria that I can’t see!
customer_reviews.author: Uurka

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is working on a condition called "burning mouth syndrome" that I was diagnosed with last Sept 2014... I've been using a mouth wash called "magic mouth wash", that I need a prescription to get... I'm hoping that if I continue with the oil pulling I'll be able to keep my problem under control... I highly recommend this type of oil to anyone who would like to try oil pulling for a healthier mouth!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: It does work
customer_reviews.text: It does work. The flavor, however, is awful. I can get past that though. You don't get much. I use to oil pull with coconut oil. Probably go back to that. It was a better value.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: I just, don’t know.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my 3rd bottle, but honestly I have no idea if it’s helping. There has been zero whitening happening so don’t buy this product for that. I went to the dentist awhile ago and they said Had nothing but bad news for me and so I started using this religiously because of how many benefits I’ve read about oil pulling. I mean my overall gum health does feel better but I also started using a different toothpaste and mouthwash. I continue using it because it’s something cheap (IMO) and easy for me to do that could be improving my overall oral health.
customer_reviews.author: alimdos

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe I’m saying this
customer_reviews.text: But this stuff is amazing! I hated the first 2 times- was thick and yuck and had jaw spasms the entire day BUT, I gave it another shot And it realllllly makes your teeth shine!!!! And I feel so fresh brushing my teeth after I do not remember how I even stumbled across this as I had never heard of it before but I LOVE IT!!!! And will buy More!! (Wish it was a bit more affordable)
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: ... into oil pulling then I can imagine this is great stuff. I just can't seem to stop salivating ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're into oil pulling then I can imagine this is great stuff. I just can't seem to stop salivating and before even 5 minutes is up my whole mouth is full of oil and spit and I can't keep it in. I'm sure the benefits would be better if that didn't happen - anyone have any advice? As for the product though it tastes good, feels good, and I'm sure works fine
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D.

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I pull to detox and this is best brand i have used. Walmart carriers some of your products but not the pulling oil ... I wish they did
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S.

customer_reviews.title: Smelled good, but leaked on delivery...
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking into oil pulling for a long time and spent a lot of time choosing a product. I was disappointed when it arrived and had leaked. I'm not sure how long it had been open so I ended up tossing it. I ordered from GuruNanda but will look for another company for my next order. On the plus side, the product smelled really good.
customer_reviews.author: joedog

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way my mouth feels after using the pulling oil. I am now adding this to my daily oral hygiene routine.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Goad

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disgusting! Couldn't keep it in my mouth. Tastes like sucking on a latex glove. I'll stick to regular organic coconut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Cheapskate

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tasting
customer_reviews.text: The taste is so horrible that even when I tried to swish around just a half teaspoon, I almost vomited.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Takes like cigarettes... :(
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because the taste is terrible. It tastes like cigarettes and Im not a smoker at all. Never have been. I still use it but will look for something else for the future.
customer_reviews.author: leisha

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients. Worth giving it a fighting chance.
customer_reviews.text: I like that there are so many good quality oils. This is my first time using this product,and I haven't used it long enough to speak about the effectiveness of whitening capability. I do know that it contains very good ingredients,so I'm going to continue to use it.I would definitely recommend giving it a good try.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Powell

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Now with Update!!!
customer_reviews.text: I will update once I’ve used for a little while but great mild peppermint taste, thick but not too thick - cleated a bunch of stuff out of my throat right after I swished for the first time! Excited to start oil pulling again and use this! Update- tried a different one after I finished bottle of this and regretted it immediately- awful. I’m not sure it’s 100% doing what it promises, but it doesn’t taste terrible and isn’t horribly difficult to do the swishing. I’m still liking it, way later!
customer_reviews.author: WhatQueenBThinks

customer_reviews.title: Meh.... I will keep using it, but makes a mess of the sink!
customer_reviews.text: I will keep using it - it's not too bad tasting, actually, the flavor is nice --- don't forget to SHAKE it well before each use though. I think it just feels funny having a mouth full of oil - and when you spit it in the sink, it gets oil all over the sink (obviously, I suppose!) I guess that is the only 'con', really.... not sure about whitening effects as I have not used it long enough. thank you...
customer_reviews.author: itsallinurmind

customer_reviews.title: Too oily, clogs up drains
customer_reviews.text: It is too thick and oily and an absolute mess to clean up. It does clog up your sink. For all the fuss, it was not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I'm truly amazed at this oil. It certainly seems to do just what it claims. It is important that you use it as prescribed. I know it's had to swish your mouth for 15 minutes but it really pays off in the long run. I use it and then take my bath, the whole time swishing. It helps the time go by less noticeably. I have very sensitive teeth. They ache all the time. When I use the pulling oil, the pain ceases. I use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette D. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: worst purchase made on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: worst stuff I ever tried. I normally do no put in bad reviews however if in this case I am making ab exception. not only is it over-priced but can cause diarrhea/ it does not seem to work as advertised
customer_reviews.author: nero time

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company, bonus stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! It works great, has a pleasant taste and leaves my mouth feeling extra clean! I also LOVE that they send fr a oil samples and a gift with each purchase! So far I’ve got a free (really nice) tongue scraper and a roll-on bottle of peppermint oil. Will continue to purchase from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the pulling oil plus the free tongue scraper. My mouth feels 10x fresher! I haven’t noticed it whitening my teeth yet but I did just start using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: freshens breath and relieves pain
customer_reviews.text: the is large enough for two doses or swigs. After 30 seconds it numbs gums about a minute. Where is crisp and cool about an hour. It has a smooth slightly sticky texture. when can't even recall the taste that's a good thing. It feels and tastes slightly less potent than Olive Oil.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoysgreatcompany

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I just don't like the taste
customer_reviews.text: I use pulling oil as an aid when flossing and picking between my teeth. It makes the process go smoothly. But I like a minty after taste and this one doesn't have that.
customer_reviews.author: CindyN

customer_reviews.title: Keeper
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to continue this oil for my teeth regimen. Pretty good flavor, easy to use, and does a good job. Just wish it was a bigger size, that’s why I gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Luvprincess

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I had a tooth that needed pulling. Doing this daily kept the pain away until I could get the tooth pulled.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Branham

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your daily dental care!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact the flavor is not overpowering and is pleasant. Also within only a couple of days I've noticed my teeth are smoother/feel cleaner even though I'm quite good with my dental care. The oil is not too thick or thin to pull. Just right making it easy to pull for longer time periods. 💕👍
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Rebhan

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: For someone who has never done oil pulling it's a very different texture and very thick. It says to start with two minutes but I couldnt do that the first time. I add a tiny bit of water to mouth after I put oil in to help with thickness. Much much better. Comes with a nice tongue scraper too.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Rud

customer_reviews.title: TASTES GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy oil to swish around for 15 minutes. I do it while showering. The light mint taste is a plus. I just started using it so can't comment on the whitening job. The bonus copper tongue scraper is the best I've used. Happy to have found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! But not a lot of product for the $
customer_reviews.text: After waking up in the morning, I swish this around anywhere from 2-10 minutes. Afterwards, I'll brush my teeth. My mouth feels much cleaner after using it and I have noticed that my teeth and gums look much healthier. My only issue is that you go through the product quite quickly, which then makes repurchasing it often very expensive. I plan on getting regular liquid coconut oil and putting a couple drops of peppermint essential oil in it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Natural And Gentle
customer_reviews.text: I have tried oil pulling before but didn’t like the taste so it was hard to keep up with. This oil has a nice peppermint flavor so it’s actually enjoyable to use. I don’t like mouthwash because it’s too harsh, so this is a more gentle and natural way to keep your teeth healthy and white. I have used it for about a week and my teeth look whiter and feel cleaner than ever!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Short-Hamiwka

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a significant difference in my breath and shade of my teeth within the first week. The flavor is fine because there’s a subtle, refreshing mint feeling when you spit it out. However, it’s just the fact that it’s oil that makes it hard to enjoy swishing around in your mouth or even smell from the bottle. If you’re not too grossed out about that, then you’re going to love the results from this product.
customer_reviews.author: EWS

customer_reviews.title: The quickest results I’ve seen!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying this product & today is my 3rd day of officially using it. By the 2nd day, my teeth is now noticeably whiter & stronger. My gums are no longer sensitive. This is the secret that your dentist does not want you to know about! Lol game changer & I’m very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: OreliaLatrice

customer_reviews.title: Shake before each use.
customer_reviews.text: This gives my mouth and teeth that fresh, polished, professional cleaning finish! Not sure about all of the other claims on here but I can say it has helped improve a foul smell I used to get when flossing in some areas. Make sure to shake before each use so the taste isn’t so bad. Will purchase again if I continue to get same results.
customer_reviews.author: kal

customer_reviews.title: I mean..
customer_reviews.text: It worked but... The process is what makes it impractical. 10 minutes is a long time to hold any liquid in your mouth and the results are good but not great (personally). This is the kind of product where results will very for each person. I liked it but I didn't LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Lola B

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The flavor is not the best but it works well, I could notice a difference in my teeth since the very first time I used it and I also noticed my teeth whitened after a couple of weeks, I'm getting my second bottle now. I highly recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product received opened and unsealed
customer_reviews.text: I received this product with open box and unsealed! That’s sooo wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ann Zosa

customer_reviews.title: should have used pulling oil earlier in life.
customer_reviews.text: Just started using a pulling oil. Sadly my teeth are on the downside now in my 60's. Even after a through brushing and flossing the oil pulls out food particles, and leaves my mouth teeth feeling cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: pete ashley

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are just that. You have to find what works for you
customer_reviews.text: I thought I’d try this product. May work for some people but I didn’t find it worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dihanna

customer_reviews.title: Not a whitening remedy. But a healthy oral choice though
customer_reviews.text: Thus by far has no effect on teeth whitening, i have very minimal yellowish spots this doesn't remove any of it. But i can feel the differences after using it. Over all a good product.. will but it again
customer_reviews.author: R.E

customer_reviews.title: Good for Oral Hygiene
customer_reviews.text: Oil pulling was a new concept to me so I definitely wanted to try this product out. It was a bit difficult at first because of the consistency (I swallowed a tiny bit my first time) but once you get used to it, it can be helpful with whitening and morning bad breath!
customer_reviews.author: Ise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pulling oil! Nice taste. I love how this oil makes my mouth, tongue and teeth feel fresh.
customer_reviews.author: E R Walker

customer_reviews.title: The perfect combination of oils!
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of oil pulling but I could never get past the coconut oil taste. This combination is wonderful! I’ve successfully pulled every day for two weeks straight! I will be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Cecily

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying this product. I like it very much. It has a very good taste. The product is worth the money. The tongue cleaner is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Very Old Remedy That Works Like A Charm!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pulling oil. It is tasteless, for the most part, with perhaps just the slightest taste of mint. After a 2 minute gargle, push, and pull through the teeth, I rinse thoroughly with cool water, and my teeth and gums look and feel good. Importantly, before I started using this oil, and the charcoal tooth powder, my gums would bleed when I brushed. Not anymore! That issue is now solved, and I'm thrilled with this and the other product that has become a mainstay in my oral care regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I did not think I would get any help with my bad breath but this pulling is working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fantasy

customer_reviews.title: Why couse dryness in my mouth
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but my tongue feels so dry after doing it. I use it before bedtime I wake up at night with my mouth so dry and when I stop using it for another night I am ok but the night that I used always get up at night looking for water to drink before so much dryness in my mouth. It's that normal? Or should I stop using it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time, good packinging and product itself is spot on!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Tate not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first attempt oil pulling. The consistency is not bad, the flavor good. I have been using it for only a few days, and I can already notice the changes in my mouth / breathe, teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Pheasant taste!
customer_reviews.text: Nice peppermint taste not unpleasant at all. It is rather thick at first but in thins out quickly! Instructions say 10 mins and this time goes by rather quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Good taste and has been a new addition to my daily routine. Also received a free bonus Ebook that I have found interesting and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good oil, awesome tongue scrapper
customer_reviews.text: Love the tongue scrapper that comes with this oil. The oil is a easy to use the smell doesn’t offend my nose or make me want to gag. I haven’t noticed it whitening my teeth, the the tongue scrapper makes a major difference to “morning breath”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool product.
customer_reviews.text: I used this once, and am so excited to continue using. The taste was great and I noticed an item of debris from my tooth fall out after first use. OMG how did I live without this. My only question... can you spit this down the sink??
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Like it and ordered pack of three more. Just started within the last month so not yet sure re: whitening abilities. Flavor and value good.
customer_reviews.author: Howard R. Hong

customer_reviews.title: How healthy and clean mouth feels.
customer_reviews.text: Have had problems with continuing soaks in mouth. Shortly after daily use soars are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Mary N. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Better than plain coconut oil...
customer_reviews.text: It’s better than using just plain coconut oil. Think I will make my own next time though because this isn’t really economical considering if you do it everyday you’ll go through a bottle in a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Health benefits and natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I started using the product when I recieved it and like the taste and it makes my breath fresh. Will continue to purchase in the future
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Better than straight coconut oil
customer_reviews.text: The mix of oils they use is much more palatable than straight coconut oil for sure! I like the light touch of peppermint.
customer_reviews.author: Helen K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very easy to use and does not leave a bad aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I was using simple coconut oil by itself but this is much better. I wish the bottle was bigger though.
customer_reviews.author: N Bleers

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Most
customer_reviews.text: This oil-puller does exactly what it is supposed to, assuming that you use it often enough and for a long enough time each time. It is not the tastiest of liquids, but you can't really expect it to be, can you? I will say that it tastes better than most of the other oil-pullers I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Chellebelle78

customer_reviews.title: This product may be excellent but I can't stand the way it tastes
customer_reviews.text: This product may be excellent but I can't stand the way it tastes. Thought I could work my way up to the ten minutes recommended but I can barely get past one minute. Rinsing it out takes a while and I've resorted to rinsing with warm water, then brushing, then rinsing with cold, then swishing with Natural Dentist (which I love!)
customer_reviews.author: mscardscardlady

customer_reviews.title: Prefer traditional oils
customer_reviews.text: I may be an odd ball, but I didn’t care for the flavor added, not sure why tho. I’d rather use more traditional oils, especially for the cost. (And I like mint)
customer_reviews.author: A Uni

customer_reviews.title: Received it in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.text: Received the product in perfect shape plus a little gift along with it. Used it twice till now, first time I was very aware of it but the second time used it for 10 minutes with no problem. Pleased with the product as of the moment.
customer_reviews.author: cristian

customer_reviews.title: Love 💕
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this product. Used others before that she thought were good, but This one is the best!! We also love the tongue cleaner which comes included!! Bought product twice already!!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly lee

customer_reviews.title: Healthy gums
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Everyone should try it. Really helps your gums.
customer_reviews.author: luckygirl1

customer_reviews.title: Have to buy 2 1/2 bottles to see full results
customer_reviews.text: I have used this about 1 week. It seems to do what it says. My only problem I didn't know beforehand was that the manufacturer even states it takes 6 weeks to notice full results. That would mean you would have to purchase 2.5 bottles of the product to get the desired outcome. At $14.99 a piece there are better options out there considering its only 4 combinations of oils in the product.
customer_reviews.author: DTrin

customer_reviews.title: Taste minty
customer_reviews.text: The taste of this isn’t bad at all and I was quite surprised. I haven’t found it to be whitening my teeth though and I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Jane Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It healed the sores in my mouth and it helped with my acne. It doesn’t taste bad at all. It’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: GuruNanda Oil Pulling Oil, Natural Mouthwash, Ayurvedic Blend of Coconut, Sesame, Sunflower, & Peppermint Oils. A Refreshing Oral Rinse - Helps Bad Breath, Healthy Gums + Whitens Teeth. (8.45 fl. oz).
product_meta.description:
Size:8.45 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)HOW TO USE
Shortly after waking and before eating or brushing your teeth, this extraordinary oil can be swished around in the mouth and spit out to """"pull” bacteria and other toxins from the body.

️To use, simply place approximately 1 tablespoon of GuruNanda Pulling Oil in your mouth and gently swish, pushing the oil between your teeth and around your mouth for 2 to 3 minutes. For better results you may gradually increase the time period up to 15 minutes as long as it is comfortable.

️When the oil begins to feel watery or if you start having jaw or neck fatigue, spit it out. Wash your mouth thoroughly with fresh clean water and then brush your teeth with a toothbrush and toothpaste.

️While you are pulling, mucous may build in the back of your throat. You may even have to expel the oil and clear the mucous from your throat before reaching your desired duration of pulling. If this occurs, use more GuruNanda Pulling Oil and continue pulling until you have hit your total pulling time. With frequent use, gradually increase your pulling time up to 15 minutes. You must brush your teeth after you pull oil as oil forms a biofilm on top of teeth. As a result, microorganisms can get trapped between the biofilm and teeth, which can create dental issues.

️Most importantly, the pulling oil should not be swallowed as it contains the very toxins and bacteria you are trying to eliminate from your body.

️Oil pulling is best performed in the morning before consuming any fluids or food. Results may vary depending on the frequency of use. Although relief is very different with individual people, users may see substantial results in as little as 6 weeks.
feature_bullets: Our Non GMO, Alcohol Free, Fluoride Free, Preservative Free, & Artificial Flavor Free Oil Pulling was formulated with ayurvedic knowledge to promote healthy weight management, better breath, healthier teeth and gums, thicker and more lustrous hair, and radiant skin.
Oil pulling is a unique oral detox methodology with a long, rich history in Ancient Indian Ayurvedic medicine that dates back more than 5,000 years. Made in the U.S.A.
Oil pulling helps increase saliva secretion and traps toxins within the oil’s particles. With oil pulling, you can use the salivary glands in your mouth as a detoxifying organ.
GuruNanda Pulling Oil is perfectly balanced combination of pure sesame oil, sunflower oil, coconut oil and peppermint oil. Our Pulling Oil is formulated with Vedic knowledge and Modern technology.
GuruNanda Pulling Oil is 100% alcohol-free and contains no artificial flavors or colors. Our Oil is rich in Omega-3 fatty acids and contains iron, calcium, and magnesium, plus Vitamins A, B and E.
